title: [Communication] Customer wants the executive to send something via WhatsApp from her personal number. (1 reports)
description:
Auto-generated ticket for Communication feature.

Problem: Customer wants the executive to send something via WhatsApp from her personal number.
Reports: 1
Affected Sellers: 3
Date: 2025-12-12

This issue was identified from 4 total reports in the Communication category on 2025-12-12.

top_problems.problem: Customer wants the executive to send something via WhatsApp from her personal number.

examples: IndiaMART should train executives to prioritize actual resolution over positive feedback requests and ensure the customer's issue is fully addressed before soliciting feedback.
The executive should send the requested information from her personal number after closing the ticket as promised.
Ensure all previous tickets are addressed and resolved promptly to avoid customer frustration.
